lexUnit.name: disperse.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: go or distribute in different directions or over a wide area.

sentence.text: According to the CIA , Iran possesses weaponized biological agents that could be dispersed by artillery and aerial bombs .

The device reportedly developed by al-Qaida to disperse deadly cyanide gas in subway cars and other confined spaces has never been used in a terrorist attack and probably would not be very effective , say experts .
Security forces cordoned the scene and used tear gas to disperse the crowd .
The forces used tear gas to disperse the demonstrators .

On Saturday , scores of people reportedly were injured when security forces used live ammunition to disperse hundreds of protesters in the coastal city of Latakia , where the political and business elite are particularly close to Assad .
In Salamiyah , the army entered and fired shots in the air to disperse protests , and witnesses said thousands continued to rally in the city of Baniyas .
U. S. forces said they responded with a single mortar round , which dispersed the insurgent mortar team .
Only since Friday have the rebels even dispersed gun trucks across the desert to escape airstrikes .
Al Jazeera showed scenes of men on horeseback and camels storming into the crowds in an apparent attempt to disperse anti-government protesters .
Kadafi loyalists used tear gas to disperse the demonstrators .
By evening , protesters had been dispersed , and police were again in control of the compound , which sits in the middle of an upscale residential neighborhood in Islamabad .
" We all want peace , " said Mujetic , whose three sons also were dispersed on battlefields in northwest Bosnia-Herzegovina .
Much of the Taliban 's structure was destroyed or dispersed by the 2001 U. S. -led invasion , which forced the militant group from power .
Small protests also broke out in the southern city of Assiut , which were dispersed quickly by security forces .
Muataz said that on Sunday he had joined about 200 other lawyers in a protest outside the main courthouse in Tripoli , which was dispersed .
